title: Analyze Mission Risk
description: A systems engineer needs to conduct a failure modes and effects analysis (FMEA) for a new interplanetary probe's communication system.

tasks.description: Identify all components of the communication system (transmitters, receivers, antennas).
For each component, brainstorm potential failure modes (e.g., transmitter failure, antenna deployment failure).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a comprehensive list of potential failures.

tasks.description: Analyze the effect of each failure on the overall mission and assign a risk score. Propose mitigations for high-risk items (e.g., add a redundant transmitter).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent completes the FMEA table and recommends adding a backup transmitter.
